text: Colobothea styligera is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Bates in 1865. It is known from Brazil and Ecuador.BioLib.cz - Colobothea styligera. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1865
title: Colobothea styligera
